events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it because the product does not meet my expectations and I would like a full refund.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's description about wanting to return their purchase.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the returned product.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and receive a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 12345ABCD. The product didn't match the description on the website and I would prefer to get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund right after you ship the item back to us. I will email you the prepaid return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I will send the product back today and appreciate your help.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory now. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund was successfully processed and there have been no further responses, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
